title: How control system is used? - Quora

response.answer_text: In a lot of aspects! Starting with small controllers used in robots for steering to space stations and satellites! Think about it in this way, do I need to control this system or not? Usually, the answer is Yes. Then you have to apply some kind of control system on top of the modeled system. If you are operating any kind of system (especially mechanic), you have a range of parameters that the system can operate safely within. The controller responsibility is to control the response of that system so it stays in the desired region of operation.
